com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.recovery

Class RecoveryHandlerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.recovery.RecoveryHandlerContext

  • public class RecoveryHandlerContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The context for recovery using store & forward.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> CLIENT_POLLING_STATUS
      A dictionary used to determine which running instance of the API Client is polling for recovery.
      static java.lang.Object POLLING_FOR_RECOVERY_LOCK
      Lock object for accepting responsibility for polling for recovery.
